_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Universal Node.js
author: azrefta@gmail.com
description: A flexible Node.js egg designed for universal usage. Supports multiple Node.js versions, customizable install & startup scripts, and smart Git clone behavior. Based on https://github.com/Azrefta/universal-ptero-nests

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

# Update paket dan install semua dependensi yang diperlukan
apt update -y && apt install -y \
  git \
  curl \
  jq \
  file \
  unzip \
  make \
  gcc \
  g++ \
  python3 \
  libtool \
  wget \
  openssh-server

variables.name: Install Command
variables.description: Optional command to install dependencies (e.g. yarn install, npm ci, etc). If empty, will default to 'npm install'.

variables.name: Running Script
variables.description: Command to start your app (e.g. node index.js, npm run dev)
